trait.name: Comm Jammers
entries: The construct suppresses all electronic communications devices within 60 feet of it.

trait.name: Circuitry
entries: The construct has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

trait.name: Piloted
entries: The construct requires an active pilot to take any actions, and if the pilot is subjected to any conditions that the construct is not immune to, the construct is also subjected to those conditions. The pilot may take their own action or one of the actions granted by the construct.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The construct makes two attacks with its blaster cannon.

action.name: Blaster Cannon
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) energy damage.

reaction.name: Redirect
entries: If the construct's pilot takes damage from a source the pilot is aware of and can see, the construct can use its reaction to instead take that damage.
